segments.text: I need to get my prescription filled .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You may pick it up in twenty minutes .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: If I wanted to , could I have it mailed to me ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , and you can renew this prescription by phone .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Are there any special instructions about this medication ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Take it three times a day .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Can I take it with food ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You should take this medicine with food and no alcohol .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Are there any side effects with this medication ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You might get a little dizzy , but that is it .
segments.speaker: S2
